pages.text: It's time to put your neso on a display base! Craft the nesoberi base block using a regular badge, a note block, and white concrete.

Right-click the base block with a nesoberi to place it on the base, or right-click the base block with an empty hand to obtain it.$(br2)When placed on a neso base block, the nesoberi will slowly get charged. It might be able to activate some special powers after charged enough!
